name: Audio Interchange File Format (AIFF)
extras: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?><metadata><field name="formatCategory">sound</field><field name="filenameExtension">aif, aiff, ief</field><field name="internetMediaType"></field><field name="pronomPUID"></field></metadata>
